items.title: Peter Schiff Counters Musk-Saylor Bitcoin Claims – ‘You Turn Valuable Energy Into Nothing’
items.description: Peter Schiff challenged Elon Musk’s assertion that Bitcoin is “based on energy,” calling its mining an energy waste.

items.title: Why Did Leggett & Platt Stock Surge 10% Pre-Market Today?
items.description: An acquisition proposal from Somnigroup International aims to keep Leggett & Platt operating under its own management while integrating it into a larg...

items.title: Tesla Stock Dips Pre-Market After Sharp Declines In November Registrations In France And Denmark: Report
items.description: While registrations in France and Denmark fell by around 50% in November, registrations in Norway increased by 175%.

items.title: Kohl’s Traders Just Got The CEO They Wanted — And the Stock’s Weekly Breakout Says It All
items.description: Last week, KSS stock soared nearly 60%, marking its best weekly performance this year, after Michael Bender was confirmed as full-time CEO.

items.title: Why Are Oil Prices Rising Today?
items.description: Benchmark Brent oil prices gained 1.8% to $63.50 per barrel, while WTI crude prices rose 1.9% to $59.64 per barrel, at the time of writing.
